long_description: Keep your bike protected with the Kryptonite Evolution Series 4 U-lock, which offers plenty of strength and a smart design to resist theft attacks. 14mm MAX-Performance hardened steel shackle resists bolt cutters and leverage attacks; hardened oval crossbar design is stronger than typical round tube. Double deadbolt locking mechanism for extensive holding power that provides added protection against twist attacks. Disc-style cylinder delivers a high level of security; rotating dust cover helps protect cylinder. Includes versatile mounting bracket for easy transportation; anti-rattle bumpers reduce noise during transport. Comes with 3 keys, 1 of which is lighted with a high intensity bulb and features a replaceable battery. Eligible for Key Safe Program; register your key number with Kryptonite for easy replacement of lost or worn keys for a minimal fee. Kryptonite rates the Evolution Series 4 U-lock an 8 on a 10-point system with 1 being simple, deterrent security and 10 being extreme security.
short_description: Keep your bike protected with the Kryptonite Evolution Series 4 U-lock, which offers plenty of strength and a smart design to resist theft attacks.
